name: twitter-feed
label: Twitter Feed
description:
Twitter feed connector fetches indicators on daily basis.

This connector has a dependency on the Threat Intel Management Solution Pack. Install the Solution Pack before enabling ingestion of Threat Feeds from this source.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Server url to get Twitter feeds data

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Get Indicators
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all indicators from Twitter feed on daily basis

parameters.title: Filter Feeds by
parameters.tooltip: Filter feed indicators by Username for filter by username, Hashtag for filtered by the hashtag and Full for all. Default value is set as Full

Username.title: Username
Username.tooltip: Enter username to filter feeds by input username
Username.name: filter_value
Username.description: Enter username to filter feeds by input username

Hashtag.title: Hashtag
Hashtag.tooltip: Enter Hashtag to filter feeds by input Hashtag
Hashtag.name: filter_value
Hashtag.description: Enter Hashtag to filter feeds by input Hashtag

parameters.name: feed_type
parameters.description: Filter feed indicators by Username for filter by username, Hashtag for filtered by the hashtag and Full for all. Default value is set as Full
